From Carrying Heels To Tying Shoelaces, Ranveer Singh & Anand Ahuja Prove Little Things Matter The Most!
From Carrying Heels To Tying Shoelaces, Ranveer Singh & Anand Ahuja Prove Little Things Matter The Most!
Soon after his wedding, Ranveer Singh had said that he wants to be the husband of the millennial, and he is proving that the tag totally belongs to him time and again.
I mean, who doesn’t want a man like Ranveer Singh in her life. He is the epitome of perfection. He leaves love-filled comments on her Deepika's pictures, he makes her laugh, never misses an opportunity to tell her how much he loves her, he has proclaimed his love for the queen, who he thinks is the most beautiful woman in the world. Ranveer Singh just can’t get enough of Deepika Padukone.
Recently, he was seen carrying Deepika Padukone’s silver heels in his hands. And this is melting our hearts. Isn’t he just so sweet?
Sometime ago, Anand Ahuja was also spotted going down on his knee to tie Sonam Kapoor’s shoelaces. And that, my friend, was even cuter than proposals. Just look at Sonam and how she is smiling ear-to-ear.
Twitter
Well, these little things matters the most in every relationships and even in life. This just shows that you see each other in positive light. A kind, special and a thoughtful effort definitely makes one another feel important and loved.
